select DATE_FORMAT(gmt_last_occur, #{dateFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) aggTime, count(1) as cnt from incident_instance where
app_instance_id = #{appInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
gmt_last_occur >= #{startTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and gmt_last_occur <= #{endTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by aggTime
